description.brief: Fully immersive control of a PR2 robot using the Oculus Rift and Razer Hydra

stack.description: The pr2_surrogate package allows you to use a PR2 as a surrogate for your physical body using the Oculus RIFT virtual reality headset and the Razer Hydra controller.
stack.author: David Gossow/dgossow@willowgarage.com
